name: Forest Spirit Guardian #74
description: A forest spirit standing amidst the trees, their glowing skin and intricate vine-like adornments make them appear almost ethereal. Their white hair, adorned with leaves and glowing lights, symbolizes their connection to nature. The mysterious expression on their face hints at a deep understanding of the forest they protect, while their glowing eyes and otherworldly aura add to their mystical presence.

attributes.value: Vines and leaves wrapped around body
Subtle energy flow from glowing tattoos
